name: RPG Merger
description:
Get this. A merger type game...but with cool named SWORDS. I promise, It only gets better. But honestly is there anything better than swords (especially ones named Big Axe Momma) ?

It goes like this: the knight kills enemies, you get loot and merge it, he kills more enemies, you get more loot. Easy enough, right?

You can choose whenever you want to grind, kill bosses for more slots, build a more tanky knight...the choice is yours. And did I mention there is a lot of swords in this game?
